name: Additional Development
descroption: Additional development headers and libraries for building open-source applications.

name: Base
descroption: The standard installation.

name: Conflicts BaseOS
descroption: This group includes packages conflicting with an everything installation from the BaseOS repo

name: Container Management
descroption: Tools for managing Linux containers

name: Core
descroption: Smallest possible installation

name: Desktop Debugging and Performance Tools
descroption: GUI tools for debugging applications and performance.

name: Development Tools
descroption: A basic development environment.

name: DNS Name Server
descroption: This package group allows you to run a DNS name server (BIND) on the system.

name: Directory Client
descroption: Clients for integration into a network managed by a directory service.

name: File and Storage Server
descroption: CIFS

name: openGauss Server
descroption: openGauss is an open source relational database management system.

name: Fonts
descroption: Fonts packages for rendering text on the desktop.

name: FTP Server
descroption: These tools allow you to run an FTP server on the system.

name: GNOME Applications
descroption: A set of commonly used GNOME Applications.

name: GNOME
descroption: GNOME is a highly intuitive and user friendly desktop environment.

name: Guest Desktop Agents
descroption: Agents used when running as a virtualized desktop.

name: Hardware Monitoring Utilities
descroption: A set of tools to monitor server hardware.

name: Hardware Support
descroption: This group is a collection of tools for various hardware specific utilities.

name: Headless Management
descroption: Tools for managing the system without an attached graphical console.

name: Infiniband Support
descroption: Software designed for supporting clustering

name: Input Methods
descroption: Input method packages for the input of international text.

name: Internet Applications
descroption: Email

name: Internet Browser
descroption: The Firefox web browser

name: Java Platform
descroption: Java support for the Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server and Desktop Platforms.

name: Large Systems Performance
descroption: Performance support tools for large systems.

name: Legacy UNIX Compatibility
descroption: Compatibility programs for migration from or working with legacy UNIX environments.

name: Legacy X Window System Compatibility
descroption: Compatibility programs for migration from or working with legacy X Window System environments.

name: Mail Server
descroption: These packages allow you to configure an IMAP or SMTP mail server.

name: Mainframe Access
descroption: Tools for accessing mainframe computing resources.

name: Network File System Client
descroption: Enables the system to attach to network storage.

name: Network Servers
descroption: These packages include network-based servers such as DHCP

name: Networking Tools
descroption: Tools for configuring and analyzing computer networks.

name: Common NetworkManager submodules
descroption: This group contains NetworkManager submodules that are commonly used

name: Performance Tools
descroption: Tools for diagnosing system and application-level performance problems.

name: Platform Development
descroption: Recommended development headers and libraries for developing applications.

name: Printing Client
descroption: Tools for printing to a local printer or a remote print server.

name: Python Web
descroption: Basic Python web application support.

name: Remote Management for Linux
descroption: Remote management interface.

name: Scientific Support
descroption: Tools for mathematical and scientific computations

name: Security Tools
descroption: Security tools for integrity and trust verification.

name: Server product core
descroption: Packages mandatory for the server product.

name: Windows File Server
descroption: This package group allows you to share files between Linux and MS Windows(tm) systems.

name: Standard
descroption: The standard installation.

name: System Tools
descroption: This group is a collection of various tools for the system

descroption: Smallest possible virtualization host installation.

descroption: vswitch installation.

name: Smart Card Support
descroption: Support for using smart card authentication.

descroption: These tools allow you to run a Web server on the system.

name: X Window System
descroption: X Window System Support.
